text: Do Romeo and Juliet, Cook's Assistant, and Sheep Shearer to quickly obtain the required 7 Quest Points that unlock selling access to the list of protected items at the Grand Exchange.
As a new player, you may claim free runes from the Magic combat tutor in Lumbridge every 30 minutes. Consume them and claim more as often as possible for free Magic experience.
Bones are one of the select few items that are exempt from the restricted item list. Sell bones you get from Chickens, Cows, etc on the Grand Exchange for 100+ GP!
You can use the Canoe system to travel along the River Lum.
Need runes for Magic? There are NPC rune shops in both Port Sarim and Varrock.
Cut the Oak trees and sell them to the Lumbridge General Store for quick experience and money.
Count Check offers a one-time instant teleport from Lumbridge to the Stronghold of Security, where you will earn 10,000 GP upon completion. Spam click the doors to skip the questions.
